snippet.title: Ys Oath in Felghana Steam Trailer
snippet.description:
The Windows game that reintroduced Felghana to Japan back in 2005 has now been released in English as a downloadable purchase through Steam for $14.99 (North America), €11.99 (Europe), 9.99 GBP (United Kingdom) or 299 rubles (Russia). For more information or for purchase, go to http://store.steampowered.com/app/207320/ to visit the official Steam product page for this title.

Note that these two versions of Ys: The Oath in Felghana differ in their features and general presentation. To help decide which version of Felghana is right for you, please refer to the following lists.

Features exclusive to the PC version:
- High-resolution graphics with support for a wide variety of screen sizes.
- Consistent 60fps+ framerate allows for a smoother gameplay experience.
- Customizable graphics settings including heat shimmer effects, blood effects and high-resolution texturing.
- Fully user-configurable support for any Windows-compatible gamepad or controller.
- Over 30 Steam achievements ranging from hardcore challenges to humorous interjections.
- Individual Steam leaderboards for all skill levels and game modes.
- Steam Cloud support, allowing for your game save data and unlocks to follow you anywhere you go.

For more information visit http://www.worldofys.com/ysf/
